column14: As a developer, I want have a SDD to record some important information.
As a registered user, I want to reset password when current password is locked/forgotten, so the updated password can be used for next login.
column18:
Given a forgot password link is  available, 

When the user clicks on the link, 

Then a page will be displayed having title "Forgot Password" to the user to enter the username, new password and confirm password.
 (spalora - Sep 16, 2021)
column19:
Given the forgot password screen is available, 

When the user fills all mandatory fields(username, new password, confirm password) and click on submit button, 

Then backend system is updated with new password and display the success message  (spalora - Sep 16, 2021)
column20:
Given the forgot password screen is available,

When the user fills all mandatory fields(username, new password, confirm password) and click on submit button,

Then the proper error message will be displayed to the user  ,  if new password is not updated to the backend system. (spalora - Sep 20, 2021)

column14: As a new user, I want to create an account so that I can access the simple health application features.
column18: Given a user is not registered,  when the user launches the app from the home screen, then the user will land on a new screen with Sign up tab selected by default.  (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column19: Given the signup tab is selected, when the user fills in all the mandatory fields such as name, username, email, dob, password, confirm password and click on signup button then the new user will be added to the Database, display the success/error if account creation is successful or failure.  (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column20: Given the signup tab is selected, when the user does not fill all of the required fields and click on signup button then the user will be displayed with an error message "Please complete all required fields" (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column21: Given the signup tab is selected, when the user fills in all the mandatory fields but the password and confirm password field does not match then the user will be displayed with an error message "Password and confirm password does not match" (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column22: Given the signup tab is selected, when the user fills in all the mandatory fields and click on signup button and signup is successful, user will redirected to the home screen.  (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column25: Handle UI validations before user create an account(sandeep)- (1hr)
column27: Create a user using the Database method which will add new user to the database. (Sandeep) - (1hr)
column29: Show success/error messages based on UI validations (sandeep) - (0.5hr)

column14: As a user, I want to be able to login so that I can access the simple health application features.
column18:
Given a user is not logged in, when the user launches the app from the home screen, then the user will land on the signup screen and user will click on sign in tab to launch the sign in screen. 
 (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column19: Given the sign in tab is selected, when the user fills the username and password and click on sign in button then the user will be queried in the database and if found and the credentials are valid, they will see a success message otherwise they will see an error message "Please check your credentials" (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column20: Given the sign in tab is selected, when the user does not fill all the mandatory field and click on sign in button then the user will see an error message "Please enter all required fields" (Sandeep Agrawal - Sep 20, 2021)
column25: Handle UI validations before user logs in (sandeep)- (1hr)
column27: Login a user using the Database method which will query the user in the database. (Sandeep) - (1hr)
column29: Show success/error messages based on UI validations (sandeep) - (0.5hr)

column14: As a user, I want to save my current condition and be able to receive an alert, so that I can eat medicine or do some medical checks on time.
column18: Given a "Add new" button is available, when the user clicks on the button, a text entry will pop up and let the user fill the blanks. After the user fills in the information and clicks the 'Done' button on the pop-up text entry, the application will connect to the database and write the new condition to it. While processing the database, the textbox will also update the list, so the change will happen immediately. (yangye - Sep 20, 2021)
column19: Given a checkbox to on/off the Alerts, when the user checks the checkbox, the alert is on and will send a notification at setting time. Vise versa. (yangye - Sep 20, 2021)
column25: Create 'Add new' button and ‘List of user's condition’ textbox (YA) -2h
column33: Read and write conditions from database (YA)  -2h

column19: Given a profile icon shows the avatar and username, when the user clicks on the icon, it will act as a button and display the profile page to the user. (yangye - Sep 20, 2021)

column14: As a logged in user, I want to access the video tutorial for the selected exercise category, so I can add to my fitness routine to achieve specific goal.
column18:
Given Exercise screen is available, 
When user clicks on "Video tutorial" button, 
Then page will be displayed to the user to display the Respective exercise  video tutorial. (spalora - Sep 16, 2021)
column19:
Given the Video tutorial screen is available, 
When user clicks on "save" button, 
Then this tutorial will be saved to DB system, so this can be displayed in user exercise routine plan. (spalora - Sep 16, 2021)
column20:
Negative Usecase:
Given Exercise screen is available 
When User clicks on "Video Tutorial" button 
Then error screen will be displayed if backend system is down.
 (spalora - Sep 20, 2021)
column21:
Negative Usecase:
Given the Video tutorial screen is available
When user clicks on "save" button,
Then error screen will be displayed if save operation fails. (spalora - Sep 20, 2021)

column14: As a user, I want to be able to select any exercises that I want to be reminded to do throughout my day.
column18: Given a exercise page is available, when the user selects what exercises they want to be notified about, then they will receive push notifications at random times instructing them to do a certain exercise. (Jake Stephens - Sep 15, 2021)
column19: Given a user has selected exercises to be notified to do, then when that notification comes, the user will be able to click a "Tutorial" button on the notification which will bring up a video on how to do that certain exercise. (Jake Stephens - Sep 15, 2021)

column14: As a user, I want to be able to add my medication to my list of medications in the Simple Health app so that I can be notified when it is time to take my medication.
column18: Given that the medication screen is available in the app, the user will be able to enter the name, dosage, and frequency of how often they take their medication and then the user will be sent a push notification at the appropriate time to take their medication. (Jake Stephens - Sep 15, 2021)
column19: Given that the medication screen is available in the app, the user will be able to login to the app and then be able to view and edit their medications on the medications screen. (Jake Stephens - Sep 15, 2021)
